Articles.Content:
I like making and driving around rovers quite a bit and it'd be nice to know how much I'm actually traversing. Measuring point to point waypoints doesn't really work. I figured someone would've modded this in for sure, but my searches came up with nothing.

Does anyone feel like making an odometer for rovers?
Yeah. Something that gives a live indicator of that 'ground distance covered'. I'll make do with F3 in a pinch though. Thanks!
Since the info is already available in-game, I imagine it would be very doable, if it hasn't been done already!
I'll give this a try this week.
